title: ValidatePartnershipRequest
description: Optional request body for validating a partnership with customized package details

nbTickets.description: Number of tickets allocated to this partnership. Must be >= 0. If not provided, defaults to the value from the sponsoring pack.

nbJobOffers.description: Number of job offers allowed for this partnership. Must be >= 0. Required field.

boothSize.description: Size of the booth allocated to this partnership (e.g., '3x3m', '6x2m'). Must match a boothSize value present in at least one sponsoring pack for this event. If not provided, defaults to the value from the sponsoring pack.
